Python Code Snippet:

```python
def process_data(input_list, operation):
    result = []
    for item in input_list:
        if isinstance(item, int) and not (operation == "square" and item % 2 != 0) and \
           (operation == "cube" or (isinstance(item, str) and len(item) > 5)):
            result.append((operation, get_factorial(item)))
        elif operation == "even":
            if isinstance(item, int) and item % 2 == 0:
                result.append((operation, factorial(item // 2)))
    return sorted(result, key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)[:3]
```
